author: jtraglia
content: So how are client epbs implementations coming along. Do you think a devnet with 2+ clients is possible before devconnect?

author: hangleang.eth
content: we are far away from ready for interop, we just pass ssz container tests and STF tests, we haven't touch on fork choice changes

author: terencechain
content: same with prysm, we have PRs for STF and spec tests but we haven't merged anything to main branch, and we havent started validator, sync, forkchoice spec related changes

author: stefanbratanov
content: similar for Teku, we still haven't started really on fork choice related changes, sync, database and RPC. Apart from that, everything else is in a good shape for a devnet. Hopefully, after the mainnet releases are out, we would have more resources to work on Gloas.

author: nc1234
content: Just passing epoch_processing, operations and ssz_static
